pr_title: Attribute ID shall not be shown in Attribute Editor/ Attribute Button

timeline.message:
Don't set ASI id as description

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6848

Don't set ASI id as description, use "---" instead

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6848

Revert "Don't set ASI id as description, use "---" instead"

This reverts commit ad4cc919

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6848

Add sql query to cleanup all ASIs which have description = ASI_ID

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6848

timeline.bodyText:
It's ok, but as a hint/suggestion for future: create the backup as you do, and then in the UPDATE part, update those ASI records that are in the backup table
That way I as reviewer would not have to diff the two selects to make sure that there are no copy&paste difference-errors. Also i think it's cool
timeline.author: metas-ts
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+-- where clause is the same for both queries
